text: Charles Albert "Charlie" Hall, Jr. (May 7, 1930 - November 20, 2014) was an American firefighter, labor activist, academic, and politician. He served in the Florida House of Representatives from the 118th district.Charles Albert "Charlie" Hall, Jr.-Florida House of Representatives He served as a representative from 1980 through 1982. He was a professor at Florida International University. Hall was born in Miami, Florida, and died in Tallahassee, Florida, aged 84.Charles A.
